| HistoryText             = Menace was a masked identity used by a set of five or more men, posing as a mutant supremacist to cloud the investigation of armed robberies "he" committed with anti-mutant paranoia.  With the proceeds from earlier robberies, they built the robotic Mutantmen to act as Menace's minions, but their secret was uncovered and the criminals apprehended  by a young Spider-Man. {{Citation}}
